body: Last time I ate a raw vegan I had to move countries, something about "cannibalism bad" fucking normies. It's MY body so it's MY choice. Big pharma just doesn't want people eating raw vegans because they want to make money from all the sick people who think eating a healthy balanced diet of fruits meats wholegrains and vegetables is ok.

Mmm chicken, chicken chicken chicken. Can you smell the chicken cooking? Cooked chicken. I'll have 1 chicken please, yes I would like the raw one, yes yes I know, the cooked chickens do smell better but I'm on a raw vegan psilocybin diet and cooked food will give my neighbors dog manic depressive disorder.
